application-template.name: Yahoo Reader
application-template.description:
Read the yahoo results for BSUIR users
author: Alexander Kozlov <alexssource@gmail.com>

property.description: Please, type the directory where the google pages will be saved
property.label: Output directory
property.name: inputDirectory

property.description: Please, specify the count of yahoo pages
property.label: Pages count to parse
property.name: pagesCount
